root_banner.main_title: Vestiq: the AI ecosystem that will boost your sales
root_banner.sub_title: Explore the best of Artificial Intelligence for stores, fashion, and design.

view-image-modal.deleteImageConfirmation: Do you want to delete this image?

sign_in_page.access_message: Access your account now to use the best of AI for fashion. If you don't have an account yet, sign up for Vestiq now to start using it in your creations.
sign_in_page.password_min_length: The password must be at least 6 characters long
sign_in_page.user_not_verified: User not verified. Check your email for the verification link.

sign_up_page.name: Full Name
sign_up_page.name_min_length: The name must be at least 3 characters long
sign_up_page.password_min_length: The password must be at least 6 characters long
sign_up_page.user_not_verified: User not verified. Check your email for the verification link.

home.dress_model_description: Add any unique clothing or full outfits to a model using AI.
home.txt2img_description: Create an image from a textual description. Turn ideas into visual representations for creative or conceptual projects.
home.render_traces_description: Turn your sketches, drawings, and drafts into reality with Vestiq's trace rendering tool.

header.prompt: What do you want to create today?

model_image_area.drag_file_instruction: To start rendering your image, drag a file
model_image_area.or_click_to_choose_model_image: or click to choose Model Image

garment_image_area.or_click_to_choose_garment_image: or click to choose Garment Image

result_image_area.your_image_will_be_displayed_here: Your image will be displayed here

model_image_controls.title: Model Image Controls
model_image_controls.cover_feet_description: Allows long clothes to cover the feet/shoes or adjust their appearance.
model_image_controls.adjust_hands_description: Modifies the model's hands to better adapt to the clothing.
model_image_controls.restore_clothes_description: Keeps parts of the original clothing that were not changed (e.g., keep pants when testing a blouse).

category_buttons.tooltip: Choose between Top, Bottom, or Full Body to adjust the clothing on the model.

type_buttons.tooltip: Photo type: Clothing only: Use if the image contains only the clothing item, without a model. Model: Use if the clothing is being worn by a model in the photo.

dress_tour.welcome_description: To get started, click 'Start' in the Dress Model option and see how easy it is to create custom looks.
dress_tour.upload_image_description: To start creating your amazing images with Vestiq, the first step is to add the model's image. Click on the blank space to choose an image from your device.
dress_tour.image_uploaded_description: Your image has been successfully uploaded!
dress_tour.create_or_select_model_description: You can also select or create a model.
dress_tour.select_existing_model_description: Choose a pre-existing model from Vestiq’s gallery or select one you previously created. Perfect for those who want convenience and speed without needing to upload an image.
dress_tour.text_based_model_description: Describe the model you want to create using only text. Example: 'Woman with short hair, fair skin, wearing a neutral expression.'
dress_tour.generate_model_description: Here you can customize every detail of your model by choosing characteristics. It's an interactive way to create the model, combining different elements for a unique result.
dress_tour.model_details_description: Adjust small details to get your preferred result. Click the arrow to expand the options:
dress_tour.upload_clothing_image_description: Now, upload the image of the clothing piece or the model wearing the piece you want to dress in the previous model.
dress_tour.image_type_description: Clothing Only – Uses the piece without a model behind it. Model – Piece worn by a model.
dress_tour.select_clothing_category_description:
Now, select which part of the clothing will be applied to the model.
Top – Clothing adjusted to the torso and arms area.
Bottom – Piece applied from the waist down.
Full Body – Clothing that covers the entire body of the model.
dress_tour.generate_image_description: Click 'Generate Image' so the AI can apply the selected piece to the model realistically.
dress_tour.view_result_title: Now It's Time to See the Result
dress_tour.view_result_description: Your image will be displayed once the process is complete.

welcome_tour.greeting_message: Here, you turn your ideas into amazing creations with the help of AI.
welcome_tour.welcome_description: This is the Vestiq welcome tour. We will show you how easy it is to create personalized looks with our platform.
welcome_tour.functions_list_description: This is the list of available functions in Vestiq.
welcome_tour.select_function_description: To get started, click 'Start' on the Dress Model option and see how easy it is to create custom looks.

verify_email.code_expired: Code expired. Please request a new one.
